name: leaper (crimson_wolf_games)
description:
big thanks to lightspeed 06 for letting me use some of his music check him out!

Warning  this games web build works well on certain browsers and not on others I suggestions firefox

use the left and right arrow keys to move pre the up arrow when under a hole to jump

use the shield power up to gain protection from enemies

use the freeze power up to stop the movement of the platforms and the enemies 

gl

this game was meant to be a remake of the game as close as possible to the atari style I could do (this includes minimal intentional bugs (i am sure u will notice them) )
